Reference

Save image sequences

save_seq()

Save a sequence of still images to disk

save_map()

Save maps to disk

save_ts()

Save time series plots

Projections

do_projection()

Project points onto globe

project_to_hemisphere()

Identidy visible points on an arbitrary global hemishpere view.

Data prep

gc_endpoints()

Generate a table of location pair samples

gc_arcs()

Generate a table of great circle arcs

gc_paths()

Generate a table of incremental great circle arc segments

get_ma()

Obtain moving average map series

get_lonlat_seq()

Generate a sequence of coordinates

pad_frames()

Pad the end of list of data frames

Convert image sequences to video

ffmpeg()

Make video from still image sequence

Apps

runOrtho()

Run Shiny app example

Data sets

annualtemps

2010-2099 global projected annual average temperature anomalies

monthlytemps

2010-2099 single map grid cell projected monthly average temperatures anomalies

bathymetry

Spatially aggregated example global bathymetry surface

borders

Global national political borders

network

Simulated set of world cities locations and population-based weights
